path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Verichains_Lab/Verichains Public Audit Report - ARKRivals Token - v1.0.pdf

findings.title: Unnecessary usage of SafeMath library in Solidity 0.8.0+
findings.description: The contract uses SafeMath library for overflow checking which is already handled by Solidity 0.8.0+ by default, suggesting to use normal arithmetic operators for readability and gas saving.
